hero.subtitle: Premium tutoring services tailored to your learning style. Join Australia's leading tuition centre and achieve the results you deserve.

services.title: Our Tutoring Services
services.description: We offer comprehensive tutoring for students of all ages, specializing in VCE and HSC preparation.

maths.title: Mathematics
maths.desc: From primary school basics to complex calculus and specialist mathematics.

english.title: English & Literature
english.desc: Improve essay writing, reading comprehension, and analytical skills.

science.title: Science
science.desc: Physics, Chemistry, Biology. Understand complex concepts and practical applications.

specialist.title: VCE & HSC Specialist
specialist.desc: Targeted support for Year 11 & 12 students to maximize ATAR results in English, Maths, and Sciences.

servicesPage.title: Our Premium Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Comprehensive support for your academic and lifestyle needs in Australia.

academic.title: Academic Excellence
academic.description: Our core offering. Tailored tutoring to help you achieve your best results.

butler.title: Student Butler Service
butler.description: Your personal concierge for life in a new country. From airport pickup to medical registration, we handle the details so you can focus on studying.

visa.title: Visa & Immigration
visa.description: Professional guidance through complex immigration processes.
visa.pricingNotice: Tailored pricing based on individual assessment

services.title: Student Visa Application
services.description: Complete handling of your Subclass 500 visa application, including GTE statement drafting and document review.

services.title: Graduate Work Visa
services.description: Transition from student to professional with Subclass 485 visa support. We help you understand your eligibility and rights.

services.title: Residency & PR Consult
services.description: Long-term planning for Permanent Residency. Strategic advice on skilled migration pathways.

services.title: Document Health Check
services.description: Already prepared your application? Let our experts review your documents to minimize the risk of refusal or delay.

cta.title: Ready to achieve your best?
cta.text: Join hundreds of students who have transformed their grades with IB Heros.

contactPage.title: Get in Touch
contactPage.desc: Fill out the form and our team will get back to you within 24 hours to organize your first session.

joinTeamPage.title: Why join IB Heros?
joinTeamPage.desc: We are always looking for passionate, high-achieving individuals to join our team. If you have a strong academic record and a desire to help others succeed, we want to hear from you.

form.title: Application Form
